name: parrleiapp
description: A social sports-betting platform for sharing parlays and bets

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run install-deps && cd client && npm run build
scripts.install-deps: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && cd client && rimraf node_modules && cd ../server && rimraf node_modules
